content.title: We’d Love Your Feedback! What’s Holding You Back from Pledging?
content.creator:
Khalil Selmi
March 22, 2025
content.content:
Dear Followers,
I'm the developer of this product, created specifically for small public spaces like coffee shops and restaurants. My goal was to make it simple, easy to use, and affordable compared to other solutions.
Since you're interested in the product but haven't pledged yet, I’d love to hear your thoughts! Could you share your reason by selecting one of the options below?
1️⃣ The price is high
2️⃣ I’m waiting to see real-world results
3️⃣ Other (please share your thoughts in a comment!)
Simply comment with 1, 2, or 3—your feedback is incredibly valuable in helping us improve and move in the right direction! If you prefer, feel free to send me a private message. I'd love to hear from you.
Looking forward to your insights, and Thank you for your support!

content.title: 🚀 More Great News! Special Discount Available! 🎉
content.creator:
Khalil Selmi
March 22, 2025
content.content:
We’re excited to announce another huge discount on our customized Wi-Fi Password Display! 🎊 Now available for just 36€!
This is your chance to be part of our journey—help us bring this project to life! Only 6 days remain before the campaign ends!
Thank you for your incredible support! ❤️
